Articles.Content:
Hello all!

I just made my donation for the pre-order and I am a little confused on how to download the full version, can anyone help me with this?
I still cant see the link in my store profile, anyone? Help?

Welcome to the forums!

I believe this thread explains the situation: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10846.0

Also, this thread will help with downloading (which you seem to already know): http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7678.0

Hope this helps ;D

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Thanks a lot Epsigma! You guys are awesome.
welcome to ksp and the forums! There should be a link when you log on go to account(or whatever) and purchases click ksp and it should show up with a link
